get.description: Log out; invalidates the related cookie

post.description:
Login, takes JSON as payload; requires paid subscription, please see [https://schweizmobil.ch/en/switzerlandmobility-plus](https://schweizmobil.ch/en/switzerlandmobility-plus)

Provide account details in response payload.

get.description: Users can group their tracks into categories called filters. This endpoint provides the current list of user-defined filters.

post.description: Users can group their tracks into categories called filters. This endpoint adds a filter.

delete.description: Users can group their tracks into categories called filters. This endpoint deletes a user-defined filter.

get.description: Used to verify the user is still logged in; also provides account details (similar to login endpoint)

Obtain details of a single track

Coordinates are Swiss LV03 coordinates, [https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/knowledge-facts/surveying-geodesy/reference-frames/local/lv03.html](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/knowledge-facts/surveying-geodesy/reference-frames/local/lv03.html)

Swiss coordinates can be translated to WGS84 or other reference systems using the [swisstopo.admin.ch ](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/maps-data-online/calculation-services/m2m.html#dokumente_und_publik) REFRAME API described at

[https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/maps-data-online/calculation-services/m2m.html#dokumente_und_publik](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/maps-data-online/calculation-services/m2m.html#dokumente_und_publik)
Returns small subset of GET track endpoint.
Returns Points of Interest in the vicinity of a given user-defined track.
Obtain generic settings for the user account.

Get user-defined photos in a bbox area.

The bbox is defined in LV03 coordinates, [https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/knowledge-facts/surveying-geodesy/reference-frames/local/lv03.html](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/knowledge-facts/surveying-geodesy/reference-frames/local/lv03.html)
